text: On his watch no one will betray the true king of the elves.
He is an extremely efficient leader and is respected and feared by the Dark Elves under his command.
Many have challenged and have failed to take the life of Kouran.
Malekith, pleased with Kouran's ruthless nature, granted him command of the Black Guard, a position he has held for the last four hundred years.
A huge halberd once carried by Dark Lord Khalak of Ghrond, the first Captain of the Black Guard. Each captain since has pried it out of his predecessor's dead hands.
A magic armour first worn by Arnaetbron, a veteran of the sundering. Those who wish to attack the wearer must endure a shock of paralysing pain.
A mistress of the Dark Arts, she commands devastatingly destructive magic.
Those that have witnessed the power of what a Sorceresses can do flee in Terror.
Chief amongst the magic-wielders of Naggaroth are the sisters of the Dark Convent of Sorceresses who are gathered in the great fortress of Ghrond.
Dark Blessing from the winds of magic grants her a degree of protection against magical attack.
Ulthuan will once again be plunged into a Bloody War.
Taking such Warbeasts to Ulthuan to ensure nothing but a Bloody Victory.
Once Sorceresses of Ghrond but now cursed from Atharti are now nothing more then beast with only a sliver of awareness of their beauty and power they had.
The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.
Staff of Doom is a talisman of one of the six High Mistresses of the Covenant of Sorceresses.
Made from the corpse of a dead Kharibdyss and infused with dark magic that is has the power summon forth those slain by the Kharibdyss while it was alive.
A mistress of the Dark Arts, she skilled in both dark and fire lores to create devastatingly destructive magic..
At the caster’s command, light is driven from the battlefield and numbing darkness rushes to fill the void.
At the caster’s command, light is driven from the battlefield and numbing darkness rushes to fill the void.
Sucking the life essence of a foe and use it to heal the caster. Steal Life has no effect on the Undead.
Through decades, and often centuries, of painstaking research and scrupulous study, they learn to master magic in its purest form, an art known simply as High Magic.
The utmost concentration, the greatest attention to detail, are required if the world is to be saved from the destructive madness of the Ruinous Ones.
An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.
Those that surpass the Sun Dragons in might and enlightenment are known as Moon Dragons.
When war comes to Ulthuan, none more eagerly than the Swordsmasters of Hoeth are to defend the isles , for only in war can they truly unleash the full extent of their deadly art.
Not only a mage but also a Princess, and a relative of the Phoenix King Finubar.
The utmost concentration, the greatest attention to detail, are required if the world is to be saved from the destructive madness of the Ruinous Ones.
Can be thousands of years old but still have the vitality of those only a few hunder years old.
The Swordmasters' greatswords are forged beneath the Tower of Hoeth, by smiths whose secrets are the envy of even the priests of Vaul.
All Asur know that Ulthuan need to be defend from all that threaten it.
Passed down from one mage to the next, which has always brought the wearer  luck.
As Chief Handmaiden it her sworn duty to protect the everqueen and lead her handmaidens into battle.
A powerful enchanted bow only given to the everqueens chief handmaiden to command it power.
Chief Handmaiden is the trusted of all the Handmaidens and is tasked with leading the Handmaidens in the protection of the Everqueen if called upon to do so will die for her.
As Chief Handmaiden it her duty to ensure the very best of warriors which can mean life or death of their beloved Everqueen.
Wildwood are a prison for the most malevolent of forest spirits which the Wildwood Rangers guard.
A gift from Daith for the Lord of Cythral.
Armour Crafted from materials in the wildwoods of Cythral it said to hide users from anyone sight.
Years fighting monsters teach you how the bes way to kill them.
Those in the Wildwoods of Cythral learns the Art of ambushes better then any other part of Athel Loren.
The eyes of those that stalk the paths in Cythrals ready to cut down any that don't belong.
The Asrai move through the forests with great agility to dodge unlike their elven kin.
